title: fatal: repository 'https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/' not found
body:
Hello! I am using datalad 0.13.6 on Ubuntu 18.04.5 server. Today I am trying to troubleshoot the following error message.

```
$ datalad install -r https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git
[INFO] Installing Dataset(/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946) to get /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946 recursively 
[INFO] Cloning dataset to Dataset(/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis) 
[INFO] Attempting to clone from https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis to /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis 
[INFO] Attempting to clone from https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/.git to /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis 
[INFO] Completed clone attempts for Dataset(/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis) 
[ERROR] Failed to clone from any candidate source URL. Encountered errors per each url were:
| - https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis'...

fatal: repository 'https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/' not found']
- https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/.git
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/.git /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis'...
remote: Not Found
fatal: repository 'https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/.git/' not found'] [install(/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis)] 
{ Error: Command failed: datalad install -r https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git
[INFO] Installing Dataset(/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946) to get /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946 recursively 
[INFO] Cloning dataset to Dataset(/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis) 
[INFO] Attempting to clone from https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis to /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis

[ERROR] Failed to clone from any candidate source URL. Encountered errors per each url were:
| - https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis'...
remote: Not Found
fatal: repository 'https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/' not found']
- https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/.git
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/.git /mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis'...
remote: Not Found
fatal: repository 'https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git/analysis/.git/' not found'] [install(/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946/analysis)] 

    at checkExecSyncError (child_process.js:601:13)
    at Object.execSync (child_process.js:641:13)
    at repos.forEach.repo (/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/clone.js:60:8)
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at clone_repos (/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets/clone.js:22:9)
    at <anonymous>
    at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:188:7)
  error: null,
  cmd: 'datalad install -r https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git',
  file: '/bin/sh',
  args: 
   [ '/bin/sh',
     '-c',
     'datalad install -r https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git' ],
  options: 
   { shell: true,
     file: '/bin/sh',

      [ '/bin/sh',
        '-c',
        'datalad install -r https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds002946.git' ],

        'LESSCLOSE=/usr/bin/lesspipe %s %s',
        'LANG=C.UTF-8',
        'GIT_DISCOVERY_ACROSS_FILESYSTEM=1',
        'SINGULARITY_DOCKER_USERNAME=brainlifesing',
        'S_COLORS=auto',
        'USER=brlife',
        'PWD=/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets',
        'HOME=/home/brlife',
        'XDG_DATA_DIRS=/usr/local/share:/usr/share:/var/lib/snapd/desktop',
        'MAIL=/var/mail/brlife',
        'SHELL=/bin/bash',
        'TERM=xterm-256color',
        'SHLVL=1',
        'SINGULARITY_DOCKER_PASSWORD=gobrainlife',
        'LOGNAME=brlife',
        'PATH=/home/brlife/abcd-spec/hooks/direct:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games:/snap/bin',
        'LESSOPEN=| /usr/bin/lesspipe %s',
        'OLDPWD=/mnt/datalad',
        '_=./clone.js' ],
     killSignal: undefined,
     stdio: [ [Object], [Object], [Object] ] },
  envPairs: 
   [ 'LS_COLORS=rs=0:di=01;34:ln=01;36:mh=00:pi=40;33:so=01;35:do=01;35:bd=40;33;01:cd=40;33;01:or=40;31;01:mi=00:su=37;41:sg=30;43:ca=30;41:tw=30;42:ow=34;42:st=37;44:ex=01;32:*.tar=01;31:*.tgz=01;31:*.arc=01;31:*.arj=01;31:*.taz=01;31:*.lha=01;31:*.lz4=01;31:*.lzh=01;31:*.lzma=01;31:*.tlz=01;31:*.txz=01;31:*.tzo=01;31:*.t7z=01;31:*.zip=01;31:*.z=01;31:*.Z=01;31:*.dz=01;31:*.gz=01;31:*.lrz=01;31:*.lz=01;31:*.lzo=01;31:*.xz=01;31:*.zst=01;31:*.tzst=01;31:*.bz2=01;31:*.bz=01;31:*.tbz=01;31:*.tbz2=01;31:*.tz=01;31:*.deb=01;31:*.rpm=01;31:*.jar=01;31:*.war=01;31:*.ear=01;31:*.sar=01;31:*.rar=01;31:*.alz=01;31:*.ace=01;31:*.zoo=01;31:*.cpio=01;31:*.7z=01;31:*.rz=01;31:*.cab=01;31:*.wim=01;31:*.swm=01;31:*.dwm=01;31:*.esd=01;31:*.jpg=01;35:*.jpeg=01;35:*.mjpg=01;35:*.mjpeg=01;35:*.gif=01;35:*.bmp=01;35:*.pbm=01;35:*.pgm=01;35:*.ppm=01;35:*.tga=01;35:*.xbm=01;35:*.xpm=01;35:*.tif=01;35:*.tiff=01;35:*.png=01;35:*.svg=01;35:*.svgz=01;35:*.mng=01;35:*.pcx=01;35:*.mov=01;35:*.mpg=01;35:*.mpeg=01;35:*.m2v=01;35:*.mkv=01;35:*.webm=01;35:*.ogm=01;35:*.mp4=01;35:*.m4v=01;35:*.mp4v=01;35:*.vob=01;35:*.qt=01;35:*.nuv=01;35:*.wmv=01;35:*.asf=01;35:*.rm=01;35:*.rmvb=01;35:*.flc=01;35:*.avi=01;35:*.fli=01;35:*.flv=01;35:*.gl=01;35:*.dl=01;35:*.xcf=01;35:*.xwd=01;35:*.yuv=01;35:*.cgm=01;35:*.emf=01;35:*.ogv=01;35:*.ogx=01;35:*.aac=00;36:*.au=00;36:*.flac=00;36:*.m4a=00;36:*.mid=00;36:*.midi=00;36:*.mka=00;36:*.mp3=00;36:*.mpc=00;36:*.ogg=00;36:*.ra=00;36:*.wav=00;36:*.oga=00;36:*.opus=00;36:*.spx=00;36:*.xspf=00;36:',

     'SINGULARITY_DOCKER_USERNAME=brainlifesing',
     'S_COLORS=auto',

     'PWD=/mnt/datalad/OpenNeuroDatasets',
     'HOME=/home/brlife',
     'XDG_DATA_DIRS=/usr/local/share:/usr/share:/var/lib/snapd/desktop',
     'MAIL=/var/mail/brlife',
     'SHELL=/bin/bash',
     'TERM=xterm-256color',
     'SHLVL=1',
     'SINGULARITY_DOCKER_PASSWORD=gobrainlife',
     'LOGNAME=brlife',
     'PATH=/home/brlife/abcd-spec/hooks/direct:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games:/snap/bin',
     'LESSOPEN=| /usr/bin/lesspipe %s',
     'OLDPWD=/mnt/datalad',
     '_=./clone.js' ],
  stderr: <Buffer 5b 49 4e 46 4f 5d 20 49 6e 73 74 61 6c 6c 69 6e 67 20 44 61 74 61 73 65 74 28 2f 6d 6e 74 2f 64 61 74 61 6c 61 64 2f 4f 70 65 6e 4e 65 75 72 6f 44 61 ... >,
  stdout: <Buffer 69 6e 73 74 61 6c 6c 28 65 72 72 6f 72 29 3a 20 2f 6d 6e 74 2f 64 61 74 61 6c 61 64 2f 4f 70 65 6e 4e 65 75 72 6f 44 61 74 61 73 65 74 73 2f 64 73 30 ... >,
  pid: 15066,
  output: 
   [ null,
     <Buffer 69 6e 73 74 61 6c 6c 28 65 72 72 6f 72 29 3a 20 2f 6d 6e 74 2f 64 61 74 61 6c 61 64 2f 4f 70 65 6e 4e 65 75 72 6f 44 61 74 61 73 65 74 73 2f 64 73 30 ... >,

  signal: null,

```

It looks like ./analysis is a broken link of some kind.. but I don't know if this is an OpenNeuro issue, or github issue, or datalad issue. If could you assist me on who to contact, I'd greatly apprecaite it!
